name: Substrate has no damages or cracks
Ardex Multiprime Primer to all relevant substrate
Apply Ardex STB tape to all changes plane, penetration, and floor waste area
Setting out tiles according to construction drawing / Site confirmation
Full coverage of tiles with adhesive
Tile lippiness checked and to acceptable standard
Finishing trims & transition bars edge alignment
Tiles adhesive cured and clean properly
Grout work properly into all joint
Silicon applied and rolled to a neat finish
